sense.def:
A compromise
je dogovor, s katerim ljudje privolijo, da bodo vzeli manj, kot so sprva zahtevali.

seg.quote: It was necessary for members to make compromises to ensure party unity.
Delegates predict that some compromise will be reached.

sense.def:
To compromise
pomeni doseči dogovor z nekim človekom ali skupino, s katerim se oba odpovesta nečemu, kar sta sprva zahtevala.

seg.quote: The best thing to do is to compromise.

gramGrp.pos:
REFL VB
or
VB
with
OBJ

sense.def:
To compromise oneself or one's beliefs
pomeni storiti nekaj, zaradi česar ljudje podvomijo v našo iskrenost ali poštenje.

seg.quote: They claim he has already compromised himself.
The Government had compromised its principles.
